story.question_info: What is special about a mountain gorilla's nose?
story.answer_: It's unique like a human fingerprint

story.question_info: What is the second highest mountain in the world?
Which country held the 1960 Summer Olympics?
How many minutes are in 249 days?
What is taramasalata?
story.answer_: A type of Greek dip or paste

story.question_info: What was unusual about the Penny-Farthing bicycle?
story.answer_: The front wheel was much larger than the rear wheel

story.question_info: Which country won the first soccer World Cup?
Who was the second man to walk on the moon?
What year was the original Wizard of Oz movie released?
What is the longest river in Australia?
To one decimal point, how many millimeters are there in 57 inches?
What was the currency in Germany before the Euro?
What three colors are on the Rwandan flag that was adopted in 2001?
Who invented the modern ballpoint pen?
What is the capital city of Croatia?
Who was the 30th president of the United States?
To the nearest million, how big is Asia in square miles?
What three colors are used to create the color white on a TV or computer screen?
How many dimples are there on a Titleist Pro V1 golf ball?
What was the number 1 single in the US on May 26, 1990?
I'm full of holes but can still hold water.
The place where today comes before yesterday.
I run around the backyard, but never move.
What was the number 1 single in the US on May 26, 1990?
I dry as I get wetter
Nothing rhymes with me exactly, and you'd have a pretty hard time making scrambled eggs without my help
The pot called me black. I said 'look who's talking?!' Then, I made some tea
I make bones hard and cookies soft. Babies love me
Is it cold in here, or is it just me? Leave me open, and things will go sour really fast
I have blades but I'm not a knife. Want to cool down? Give me a whirl
I'm handy for making milkshakes, but don't put your hand inside of me! (Blender)
I don't mind if you're snotty. If you have an issue, I'm here
My other side is cool, and there's a good chance my cover's covered in drool
I have teeth but no mouth. If a bald man carries me, it's only for memory's sake
Seeing double? Check me to spot your doppelganger
I have eyes but cannot see
I have hands but cannot clap (Clock)
You cut me on a table, but I'm never eaten. (Deck of cards
The building that has the most stories
I can skip but can't walk. I'd rather sing than talk
I can jump but I have no legs
I don't mind a little weight
I have lots of stars, but I'm not the sky. I'll be sitting here quietly until you need me
Lovely Rita is my maid. You'll get a ticket if I don't get paid
If you don't spot the signs, then you might have an accident
I have the most letters. Anyone can add more letters, but only one man can take letters away
I greet every guest, but never say a word
I used to be a tree, until I traded my roots for routes. I have a rose, but I'm not garden. (Paper map
The countdown continues! Need to think about this clue? I'll give you a minute
I guard the lawn and dream of shrimp
If not for me, the birds would live in a hole in a tree
Here is my handle, here is my spout
I'm not the alphabet, but I have letters. I'm not a pole, but I have a flag
I'm half of the beach, the half without the water
Most cans don't have lids, but it would really stink if my can didn't have me. The bears or racoons might have a nice snack, though
I may look like a snake, but don't worry- I'm filled with water, not venom
This is where the tools live, and what a snake does when it's sick of its skin
I'm a bed without sheets, and I'm always dirty
Make a wish, but don't take a drink
Watch where you're walking
If you want to eat, then take a seat! (Dining room chair)
Most have clothes on the outside, but I have clothes inside
The rubber duck is at home here
I may be a bear, but there's no need to be scared
I can't mix batter, but I can bake a cake
Are you digging this hunt? No? Maybe I can help you dig it. (Shovel
I can't be-leaf how many clues you've found. Maybe this hunt's knot hard enough. This next clue should be a real stumper
When the snow comes down, I help you go down snowy hills! (Sled)
I'm a paste that doesn't glue
I come in pairs, I'm easy to lose, I go between your feet and your shoes
You carry me to a picnic, and I carry everything else! (Basket)
Until you get your license to drive a car, I'm your best means of traveling far
I go up and down, but I never move
You might say I'm popular- I always have the most dates
I'm here to wake you up, but just hit snooze and I'll shut up
Bored? Play me! I have a board, but I'm not boring! (Board game)
Nobody ever sees my waves, but I have other ways of grabbing attention
If you're craving takeout, take me out to help you decide
Easy killer. There's no prize at the bottom of my box, but that is where you'll find the next clue
I'm shaped like a donut or bagel, but I prefer soundbytes to mouth bites
Is this scavenger hunt too intense? Here's a hint- your next clue is camping out nearby
Stay tuned for this next clue. I have strings that can't be tied
My basket can't carry a thing, because it has a hole in the bottom! (Basketball hoop)
I can carry much more than books
If you go out of town, I don't need a sitter, just someone to leave me food and change my litter
I have a bark, but I'm not a tree
One of me per day keeps the doctor away
You visit me at night to sleep tight
Use me once in the morning and once at night, and I'll keep your smile nice and white
Which came first? The chicken or me? (Eggs)
I let the outside in, and wear nothing but curtains
Am I half full, or half empty? Either way, I'm not entirely empty- you'll find the next clue in me! (Glass)
I'm a shape and an instrument
Which came first? The color or the fruit? (Orange)
You can run with the clues, but don't run with me! Rock beats me every time
You sat without looking, and now feel like a rube, because the holder has no paper, only a tube
You can turn me up high, keep warm, or on low, but no matter the setting, the cooking will be slow
Put your phone in me after dropping it in water. I also make a cheap and easy dinner, on nights you just don't want to bother
I wash your clothes, but I'm not a machine
I'm always tired but never sleep. If you get sleepy, take a nap in my backseat
When you see my beauty, you're likely to gasp. To put me on, just fasten the clasp
When rain's in the forecast and you don't want to get wet, grabbing me before you leave the house is a safe bet
I always stay as still as can be. I have the power to move, but not literally
Bread goes inside of me but never comes out
Rivers have two of me. I have branches but I'm not a tree
If you find me in a road, you'll have a decision to make. If you find me in a drawer, you'll be ready to eat cake
Hop on, let’s go, don’t make me beg. My wheels are fast, but use your legs!
Open, shut, open shut. When you’re bored, I take the brunt. But there’s nothing here, you see. Time to visit the grocery
